src.models package¶

Submodules¶

src.models.model module¶

src.models.model.generate_models_parameters(parameters)¶

give a dict of individual model parameters from a list of parameters

parametersdict

dict that contains a list of parameters to test

models_dictdict

dict that contains individuals parameters for each model to test

src.models.model.get_x_y_from_df(df)¶

get the features and labels from the dataset

dfpandas.DataFrame

the dataset

xpandas.DataFrame

the features of the dataset

ypandas.core.series.Series

the labels of the dataset

modeltodo

the model to save

file_namestring

the name of the file where we save the model

pathstring

the path where we save the model

src.models.model.train_model(train, val, model_parameters)¶

train and validate a model with the best parameters

trainpandas.DataFrame

the train set

valpandas.DataFrame

the validation set

models_dictdict

dict that contains the best parameters for the model

clfestimat or estimator instance

the estimator trained

src.models.model.train_validate_models(train, val, models_dict)¶

train and validate severals models and peak the best parameters

trainpandas.DataFrame

the train set

valpandas.DataFrame

the validation set

models_dictdict

dict that contains individuals parameters for each model to test

best_modeldict

dict that contains the best parameters for the given model
